LFGA Web

File upload

In this section we will cover the upload file vulnerability, also called unrestricted file upload. We will be learning how this simple and common functionality that some web applications have is very dangerous if is not well implemented.

We will learn how to test this functionality or this button up here that we find very often in web applications.

In this section you will also find the learning and challenge section.

Let's get to it!.
